# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(npp LANGUAGES CXX)

# target
add_executable(npp "")
set_target_properties(npp PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "npp")
set_target_properties(npp PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_compile_options(npp PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CUDA>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(npp PRIVATE /EHsc)
elseif(Clang)
    target_compile_options(npp PRIVATE -fexceptions)
    target_compile_options(npp PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
elseif(Gcc)
    target_compile_options(npp PRIVATE -fexceptions)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(npp PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-O2>)
else()
    target_compile_options(npp PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(npp PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET npp PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_sources(npp PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)
